information.name: sms-twilio
information.description: This plugin sends SMS notifications via Twilio. NOTE: only phone numbers in the international format can be used, e.g. +155 555 1234
information.author: Ubiquiti Networks, Inc.

configuration.label: Twilio SMS number
configuration.description: A Twilio phone number you purchased at twilio.com/console
